mapper.insert: INSERT INTO review (review_no, review_name, review_email, review_title, review_rating, review_content, member_id, product_no) VALUES (#{review_no}, #{review_name}, #{review_email}, #{review_title}, #{review_rating}, #{review_content}, #{member_id}, #{product_no})
mapper.select: select review_no, review_name, review_email, review_title, review_rating, review_content, member_id, product_no from review where review_no = #{review_no}
mapper.update: update review set review_name = #{review_name}, review_email = #{review_email}, review_title = #{review_title}, review_rating = #{review_rating}, review_content = #{review_content}, member_id = #{member_id}, product_no = #{product_no} where review_no = #{review_no}
